author: Travis Oscarson
title: Never-Before-Seen Robin Williams Clips
text:
Travis Oscarson 12:20 PM, Oct 12, 2015 Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. Show Caption Previous Next 
"Never-Before-Seen Robin Williams Clips" is #trendingUp and you can see the entire video now, on The List! 
Dreams do come true. With Disney's re-release of Aladdin, we will finally have the opportunity to watch never-before-seen footage of the late Robin Williams in the studio, voicing the Genie. Williams' outtakes are accompanied by rough sketches of what the Genie might have looked like while performing these various characters. As Aladdin writer/director John Musker says:â€œHe was the Genie. He was bigger than life." Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved.
